hint.enabledFeatures: Enable / disable features to show / hide related interfaces. This setting only affects the interface display, existing data are hidden (not deleted) when the feature is disabled.

layout.calendar: Provide a calendar to quickly access contents for a particular date.
layout.timeline: Display the whole-month contents in a timeline.
layout.notebook: A pure notebook. It stores contents without date, but you can give a title for each pages. It cannot be changed to Calendar or Timeline layout after it is created.

field.firstWeekDay: Calendar started day of the week

hint.protectedByPasswordHint: When password is enabled, you need provide a password to access diaries. Please remember your password, otherwise you are not able to access your diaries anymore.
hint.highlightedWeekDays: Decide which days of the week need to be highlighted.
hint.firstWeekDay: Decide which day of the week the calendar started with.
hint.font: This is a diary essay preview, please choose the settings which make you most comfortable. ðŸ™‚
